cause.description:
Donors to the San Francisco Symphony play a crucial role in sustaining the Symphony's tradition of artistic excellence. Ticket revenue alone does not cover the cost of presenting symphonic programs of the highest caliber nor pay for the Symphony's nationally recognized education programs and community engagement efforts. The San Francisco Symphony relies on your charitable support to help meet those needs. Consider the many ways your contribution can help ensure a strong future for the San Francisco Symphony.
1. Fill the gaps left by cuts in school music education programs
2. Maintain and build on position as one of the world's leading orchestras
3. Present free and community concerts
cause.mission: set the highest possible standard for excellence in musical performance at home and around the world; enrich, serve, and shape cultural life throughout the spectrum of Bay Area communities
cause.name: San Francisco Symphony
